Body: I'm working on a Login Authentication Service, and I'm at the point where my Android application accepts the username and password from the user and converts it into a JSON object, ready to be passed to the authentication service.This authentication service is running on my Apache Tomcat localhost. My question is, how do I pass this object (which is currently in my android code in android studio) to this JAVA service (on Eclipse) on the localhost?Thanks.
Title: Passing a JSON object from Android Studio to a Java service running on Apache Tomcat localhost
